mapper.update: INSERT INTO jungsand (jungsanNum, hotelId, paydate, paytype, roomnum, roomname, peopleCount, checkinDay, checkoutDay, price) SELECT jungsanD_seq.NEXTVAL jungsanNum ,r.hotelId, p.paydate, p.paytype, d.roomnum, m.roomname, d.peopleCount, d.checkinDay, d.checkoutDay, d.price FROM reserdetail d JOIN reservation r ON d.reservationnum = r.reservationnum JOIN pay p ON p.reservationnum = r.reservationnum JOIN room m ON m.roomnum = d.roomnum WHERE r.hotelId = #{hotelId} AND TO_CHAR(paydate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{day} AND TO_CHAR(paydate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(checkinDay, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM jungsand WHERE hotelId = #{hotelId} AND TO_CHAR(paydate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{day}
mapper.select: SELECT jungsanNum, hotelId, payType, roomNum, roomName, peopleCount, price ,TO_CHAR(jungsanCreated,'YYYY-MM-DD') jungsanCreated ,TO_CHAR(payDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') payDate ,TO_CHAR(checkinDay,'YYYY-MM-DD') checkinDay ,TO_CHAR(checkoutDay,'YYYY-MM-DD') checkoutDay FROM jungsand WHERE hotelId = #{hotelId} AND TO_CHAR(paydate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{day}

SELECT a1.dates payDate, NVL(price,0) price, NVL(peopleCount,0) peopleCount FROM ( SELECT LEVEL dates FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (LAST_DAY(#{day}) - TRUNC(to_date(#{day}),'MM') + 1) )a1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( select TO_CHAR(payDate,'DD')dates,payDate, SUM(price) price, SUM(peoplecount) peopleCount from jungsanD where paydate between TRUNC(to_date(#{day}),'MM') AND LAST_DAY(#{day}) AND hotelId = #{hotelId} group by paydate order by paydate )a2 ON a1.dates = a2.dates ORDER BY a1.dates
